entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 8:43 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
